document.full_text: an afghan policeman shot and killed two members of the nato-led coalition who were training police in southern afghanistan, the alliance said friday, the latest in a spate of "rogue" shootings by members of the country's security forces.
document.title: "rogue" afghan policeman kills two nato troops
lines_and_colors: an afghan policeman shot and killed two members of the nato-led coalition who were training police in southern afghanistan, the alliance said friday, the latest in a spate of "rogue" shootings by members of the country's security forces.
